/*--------------------------------------------------------------
&gt;&gt;&gt; TABLE OF CONTENTS:
----------------------------------------------------------------

# Typography
# Elements
# Forms
# Navigation
	## Links
	## Menus

	## Captions
	## Galleries

@import 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300,400,600,700,800';
/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Normalize
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
html {
  font-family: sans-serif;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
}

body {
  margin: 0;
}

article,
aside,
details,
figcaption,
figure,
footer,
header,
main,
menu,
nav,
section,
summary {
  display: block;
}

audio,
canvas,
progress,
video {
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: baseline;
}

audio:not([controls]) {
  display: none;
  height: 0;
}

[hidden],
template {
  display: none;
}

a {
  background-color: transparent;
}

a:active,
a:hover {
  outline: 0;
}

abbr[title] {
  border-bottom: 1px dotted;
}

b,
strong {
  font-weight: bold;
}

dfn {
  font-style: italic;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 2.25em;
  margin: 0.67em 0;
}

mark {
  background: #ff0;
  color: #000;
}

small {
  font-size: 80%;
}

sub,
sup {
  font-size: 75%;
  line-height: 0;
  position: relative;
  vertical-align: baseline;
}

sup {
  top: -0.5em;
}

sub {
  bottom: -0.25em;
}

img {
  border: 0;
}

svg:not(:root) {
  overflow: hidden;
}

figure {
  margin: 1em 40px;
}

hr {
  box-sizing: content-box;
  height: 0;
}

pre {
  overflow: auto;
}

code,
kbd,
pre,
samp {
  font-family: monospace, monospace;
  font-size: 1em;
}

button,
input,
optgroup,
select,
textarea {
  color: inherit;
  font: inherit;
  margin: 0;
}

button {
  overflow: visible;
}

button,
select {
  text-transform: none;
}

button,
html input[type=button],
input[type=reset],
input[type=submit] {
  -webkit-appearance: button;
  cursor: pointer;
}

button[disabled],
html input[disabled] {
  cursor: default;
}

button::-moz-focus-inner,
input::-moz-focus-inner {
  border: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

input {
  line-height: normal;
}

input[type=checkbox],
input[type=radio] {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 0;
}

input[type=number]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
input[type=number]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  height: auto;
}

input[type=search]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,
input[type=search]::-webkit-search-decoration {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
}

fieldset {
  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;
  margin: 0 2px;
  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;
}

legend {
  border: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

textarea {
  overflow: auto;
}

optgroup {
  font-weight: bold;
}

table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0;
}

td,
th {
  padding: 0;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Typography
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
body,
button,
input,
select,
textarea {
  color: #6d6b82;
  font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 43.75em) {
  body,
button,
input,
select,
textarea {
    color: #6d6b82;
    font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-size: 1rem;
    line-height: 1.5;
  }
}
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  clear: both;
  color: #582c83;
  font-weight: 300;
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
}

dfn, cite, em, i {
  font-style: italic;
}

blockquote {
  margin: 0 1.5em;
}

address {
  margin: 0 0 1.5em;
}

pre {
  background: #eee;
  font-family: "Courier 10 Pitch", Courier, monospace;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  margin-bottom: 1.6em;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  padding: 1.6em;
}

code, kbd, tt, var {
  font-family: Monaco, Consolas, "Andale Mono", "DejaVu Sans Mono", monospace;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
}

abbr, acronym {
  border-bottom: 1px dotted #00c0aa;
  cursor: help;
}

mark, ins {
  background: #fff9c0;
  text-decoration: none;
}

big {
  font-size: 125%;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Elements
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

*,
*:before,
*:after {
  /* Inherit box-sizing to make it easier to change the property for components that leverage other behavior; see http://css-tricks.com/inheriting-box-sizing-probably-slightly-better-best-practice/ */
  box-sizing: inherit;
}

body {
  background: #fff;
  /* Fallback for when there is no custom background color defined. */
}

blockquote, q {
  quotes: "" "";
}
blockquote:before, blockquote:after, q:before, q:after {
  content: "";
}

hr {
  background-color: #ccc;
  border: 0;
  height: 1px;
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
}

ul, ol {
  margin: 0 0 1.5em 3em;
}

ul {
  list-style: disc;
}

ol {
  list-style: decimal;
}

li &gt; ul,
li &gt; ol {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-left: 1.5em;
}

dt {
  font-weight: bold;
}

dd {
  margin: 0 1.5em 1.5em;
}

img {
  height: auto;
  /* Make sure images are scaled correctly. */
  max-width: 100%;
  /* Adhere to container width. */
}

figure {
  margin: 1em 0;
  /* Extra wide images within figure tags don't overflow the content area. */
}

table {
  margin: 0 0 1.5em;
  width: 100%;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Forms
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
button,
input[type=button],
input[type=reset],
input[type=submit] {
  border: 1px solid;
  border-color: #00c0aa;
  /*border-radius: 3px;*/
  background: #00c0aa;
  /*box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5), inset 0 15px 17px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5), inset 0 -5px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);*/
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 1;
  padding: 1.05em 1.6em;
  /*text-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);*/
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 0.12em;
  font-weight: 800;
}
button:hover,
input[type=button]:hover,
input[type=reset]:hover,
input[type=submit]:hover {
  border-color: #00c0aa;
  /*box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8), inset 0 15px 17px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8), inset 0 -5px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);*/
}
button:active, button:focus,
input[type=button]:active,
input[type=button]:focus,
input[type=reset]:active,
input[type=reset]:focus,
input[type=submit]:active,
input[type=submit]:focus {
  border-color: #00c0aa;
  /*box-shadow: inset 0 -1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5), inset 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);*/
}

input[type=submit].search-submit {
  background: url(images/icon_mag-glass.png) no-repeat;
  text-indent: -9999px;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  height: 15px;
  width: 15px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

input[type=submit].purple,
input[type=button].purple {
  background-color: #582c83;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 1em;
  border: none;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

input[type=submit].blank-purple,
input[type=button].blank-purple {
  background-color: #fff;
  color: #582c83;
  padding: 1em;
  border: none;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

input[type=submit].blank-aqua,
input[type=button].blank-aqua {
  background-color: #fff;
  color: #00c0aa;
  padding: 0.8em;
  border: none;
}

input[type=submit].blank-blue,
input[type=button].blank-blue {
  background-color: #fff;
  color: #403a60;
  padding: 0.8em;
  border: none;
}

input[type=submit].blank-button,
input[type=button].blank-button {
  background: transparent;
  color: #403a60;
  font-weight: 600;
  letter-spacing: normal;
  font-size: 0.9375em;
  border: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

#mblocator input[type=submit] {
  font-size: 0.75em;
  padding: 0.9em 1.2em;
}

#mblocator input[type=text]::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  color: #666666;
}

.thickbox.provider-appt-btn {
  clear: both;
  float: left;
}

input[type=text],
input[type=email],
input[type=url],
input[type=password],
input[type=search],
input[type=number],
input[type=tel],
input[type=range],
input[type=date],
input[type=month],
input[type=week],
input[type=time],
input[type=datetime],
input[type=datetime-local],
input[type=color],
textarea {
  color: #666;
  border: 1px solid #00c0aa;
  border-radius: 3px;
  padding: 3px;
}
input[type=text]:focus,
input[type=email]:focus,
input[type=url]:focus,
input[type=password]:focus,
input[type=search]:focus,
input[type=number]:focus,
input[type=tel]:focus,
input[type=range]:focus,
input[type=date]:focus,
input[type=month]:focus,
input[type=week]:focus,
input[type=time]:focus,
input[type=datetime]:focus,
input[type=datetime-local]:focus,
input[type=color]:focus,
textarea:focus {
  color: #111;
}

/*
input[type="text"] {
  border: none;
}
*/
select {
  border: 1px solid #00c0aa;
}

textarea {
  width: 100%;
}

::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 0.8em;
}

:-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 18- */
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 0.8em;
}

::-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 19+ */
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 0.8em;
}

:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 0.8em;
}

.centernotesform .gform_footer {
  margin: 0 !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
}

.centernotesform .gform_button {
  font-size: 0.6em !important;
  line-height: initial !important;
  margin-top: 8px !important;
  width: auto !important;
}

.centernotesform .textarea.small {
  font-size: 0.8em !important;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Navigation
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*--------------------------------------------------------------
## Links
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
a {
  color: #403a60;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
}
a:visited {
  color: #403a60;
}
a:hover, a:focus, a:active {
  color: #403a60;
}
a:focus {
  outline: thin dotted;
}
a:hover, a:active {
  outline: 0;
}
a:hover {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #735990;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
## Menus
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
.main-navigation {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  font-size: 0.75em;
}

.main-navigation ul {
  display: none;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding-left: 0;
}

.main-navigation ul ul {
  float: left;
  position: absolute;
  top: 2.5em;
  left: -999em;
  z-index: 99999;
  width: 1000%;
  max-width: 850px;
  /*display: flex;*/
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.main-navigation ul ul ul {
  left: -999em;
  top: 0;
}

.main-navigation ul ul li:hover &gt; ul, .main-navigation ul ul li.focus &gt; ul {
  left: 100%;
}

.main-navigation ul ul a {
  /*width: 200px;*/
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.main-navigation ul ul a:hover,
.main-navigation ul ul a.focus {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.main-navigation ul li:hover &gt; ul,
.main-navigation ul li.focus &gt; ul {
  left: auto;
}

.main-navigation li {
  float: left;
  position: relative;
}

.main-navigation li:hover &gt; a, .main-navigation li.focus &gt; a {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.main-navigation a {
  color: #6d6b82;
  font-weight: 800;
  display: block;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

.main-navigation a:hover {
  color: #582c83;
  border-bottom: none;
}

.main-navigation .current_page_item &gt; a,
.main-navigation .current-menu-item &gt; a,
.main-navigation .current_page_ancestor &gt; a,
.main-navigation .current-menu-ancestor &gt; a {
  color: #582c83;
}

#toggle {
  float: right;
  display: block;
  margin: 1%;
}

  left: -250px;
  overflow: auto;
}

  float: right;
  font-size: 24px;

  padding-right: 5px;
}

  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;

}

  color: #FFF;
  text-decoration: none;
  width: 100%;
}

  width: 100%;

}

  max-width: 650px;
}

  width: 100%;
  max-width: 500px;
  padding: 2% 0 2.5%;
  /*display: flex;*/
}

  letter-spacing: 0.2em;
}

  content: "//";
  padding: 0 0.75em;
}

  content: "";
  padding: 0;
}

  min-height: 40px;
  display: none;
}

#secondary-nav .current-menu-item,

  border-bottom: 2px solid #00c0aa;
}

  border-bottom: 2px solid #00c0aa;
}

#tertiary-nav.main-navigation {
  display: none;
}

.site-main .comment-navigation,
.site-main .posts-navigation,
.site-main .post-navigation {
  margin: 0 0 1.5em;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.comment-navigation .nav-previous,
.posts-navigation .nav-previous,
.post-navigation .nav-previous {
  float: left;
  width: 50%;
}

.comment-navigation .nav-next,
.posts-navigation .nav-next,
.post-navigation .nav-next {
  float: right;
  text-align: right;
  width: 50%;
}

.top-navigation {
  width: 100%;
}

.menu-top-nav-container {
  float: right;
  height: 35px;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #ffffff;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul {
  display: block;
  /*
  position: relative;
  float: right;
  width: 20.36%;
  min-width: 200px;
  */
}

/*
.menu-top-nav-container ul:before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  border-top: 35px solid #ffffff;
  border-right: 35px solid #ffb511;
  width: 0;
}
*/
.menu-top-nav-container ul li {
  color: #403a60;
  font-size: 1.25em;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.9em;
  height: 35px;
  float: right;
  background-color: #ffcd00;
  padding: 0.2em 8.5% 0 3.6em;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li a {
  color: #403a60;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-transform: none;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li form {
  overflow: hidden;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li a:hover,
.menu-top-nav-container ul li a:active,
.menu-top-nav-container ul li a:visited {
  color: #403a60;
  border-bottom: none;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li#find-doc-slider:before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  border-top: 35px solid #ffffff;
  border-right: 35px solid #ffcd00;
  width: 0;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li input[type=text] {
  color: #403a60;
  font-weight: 600;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-width: 0 0 1px 0;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #ffb511;
  padding: 0;
  outline: 0;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li input[type=text]::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  color: #403a60;
  font-size: 0.9375em;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li input[type=text]:-moz-placeholder {
  color: #403a60;
  font-size: 0.9375em;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li input[type=text]::-moz-placeholder {
  color: #403a60;
  font-size: 0.9375em;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li input[type=text]:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #403a60;
  font-size: 0.9375em;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.menu-top-nav-container ul li#covid-slider {
  color: #6d6b82;
  font-size: 1.25em;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.9em;
  height: 35px;
  float: left;
  background-color: #81cec7;
  padding: 0.2em 9.5% 0 0.5em;
  overflow: hidden;
}

  color: #6d6b82;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.2em;
  text-transform: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  width: 130px;
}

  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  border-bottom: 35px solid #ffffff;
  border-left: 35px solid #81cec7;
  width: 0;
}

  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  border: none;
  width: 0;
}

  min-width: 450px;
}

  min-width: auto;
}

  display: none;

  justify-content: space-between;
}

  margin: 1.75em 2% 0 0;
}

  margin-right: 0;
}

  justify-content: center;
}

  margin-right: 3em;
  height: 3.5em;
}

  vertical-align: middle;
  height: 4.125em;
}

.main-navigation ul.subsubmenu li a {
  text-transform: none;
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 1.2em;
}

  display: none;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;

}

  float: right;
  position: relative;
}

  font-size: 1.2em;
}

  width: 100%;
}

  width: 100%;
  min-width: auto;
  display: block;
}

  width: 20%;

}

  font-weight: 600;
  color: #403a60;
  padding: 5% 0;
  cursor: text;
}

  position: initial;
  display: block;
}

.main-navigation.footer-menu .sub-menu li {
  float: none;
}

.main-navigation.footer-menu .sub-menu li a {
  font-size: 1.2em;
  color: #fff;
  text-transform: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 400;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #6d6b82;
}

.main-navigation.footer-menu .sub-menu li a:hover {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #735990;
}

.search-navigation {
  position: absolute;
  right: 2%;
  bottom: 0;
  display: none;
}

.search-navigation .search-form input[type=search] {
  border: 1px solid #efefef;
  width: 9.5em;
  display: none;
  vertical-align: top;
  position: absolute;
  right: 165px;
  bottom: 14px;
}

.search-navigation form {
  float: right;
  height: 3.875em;
  border-right: 1px solid #efefef;
  padding: 2em 1.25em 0 0;
  width: 2.5em;
  text-align: right;
  display: none;
}

.search-navigation ul {
  list-style: none;
  float: right;
  font-size: 0.8125em;
  line-height: 1.5em;
  text-align: right;
  margin: 0;
}

  margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.search-navigation ul li a:hover,
.search-navigation ul li a:active,
.search-navigation ul li a:visited {
  color: #6d6b82;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-bottom: none;
}

  text-align: center;
  padding: 15px 0;
}

.nivo-controlNav a {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.nivo-controlNav a.active {
  font-weight: bold;
}

  display: inline;
  /* Unhide the thumbnails */
  position: relative;
  margin: 5px;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.nivo-controlNav .active img,
.nivo-controlNav img:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}

  text-align: center;
  padding: 15px 0;
}

.nivo-controlNav a {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.nivo-controlNav a.active {
  font-weight: bold;
}

  display: inline;
  /* Unhide the thumbnails */
  position: relative;
  margin: 5px;
  opacity: 0.7;
}

.nivo-controlNav img:hover {

}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Accessibility
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* Text meant only for screen readers. */
.screen-reader-text {
  clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
  position: absolute !important;
  height: 1px;
  width: 1px;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.screen-reader-text:focus {
  background-color: #f1f1f1;
  border-radius: 3px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 2px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  clip: auto !important;
  color: #21759b;
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  height: auto;
  left: 5px;
  line-height: normal;
  padding: 15px 23px 14px;
  text-decoration: none;
  top: 5px;
  width: auto;
  z-index: 100000;
  /* Above WP toolbar. */
}

/* Do not show the outline on the skip link target. */
#content[tabindex="-1"]:focus {
  outline: 0;
}

  display: inline;
  float: left;
  margin-right: 1.5em;
}

  display: inline;
  float: right;
  margin-left: 1.5em;
}

  clear: both;
  display: block;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

.entry-content:after,

.comment-content:after,

.site-header:after,

.site-content:after,
.site-footer:before,

  display: table;
  table-layout: fixed;
}

.entry-content:after,
.comment-content:after,
.site-header:after,
.site-content:after,

}

/* Gold Circle Providers */

  color: #ffd700;
  text-decoration: none;
  cursor: pointer;
}

span.treatmentsPerformedIcon a.nstooltip:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

    width: 50%;

    width: 450px;

    font-size: 12px;

    max-width: none;

.lander-wrap {
  background-image: url("images/icon_part-logo.png");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right bottom;
  background-size: 400px;
}

.lander-wrap a:hover {
  text-decoration: none !important;
  border: none !important;
}

.lander-wrap .hero-wrap {
  background-color: transparent;
  background-image: url("images/lander_hero.png");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  -webkit-background-size: cover;
  background-size: cover;
  color: #582c83;
  font-size: 2vw;
  height: 30vw;
  line-height: 1.3em;
}

.lander-wrap .hero-wrap .text-wrap {
  float: left;
  padding: 6% 25% 4% 10%;
  width: 60%;
}

.lander-wrap .hero-wrap .text-wrap.right-text {
  font-size: 0.7em;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.2em;
  padding: 9% 10% 4%;
  text-align: center;
  width: 40%;
}

  margin-bottom: 6%;
}

  width: 6.5vw;
}

  padding: 7px 13px;
}

}

  box-shadow: 0 6px 19px #c5c5c5;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

  padding: 0;
  width: 50%;
  float: left;
  margin-right: 3.143%;
}

  border: none;
}

  vertical-align: middle;
}

  padding: 0.75% 0 1.536%;
}

  color: #fff;
  background-color: #6d6b82;
}

.click2chat {
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 0px;
  right: 0px;
  max-width: 420px;
  height: auto;
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19);
  z-index: 1001;
}

.c2c-header {
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  border-radius: 15px 15px 0 0;
  background: #582c83;
  padding: 1px;
  text-align: center;
}

  color: #fff;
}

  font-size: 13px;
  line-height: 1.2;
  margin: 10px 0;
}

  color: #ff0000;
  height: 25px;
}

  padding: 15px;
}

  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 700;
}

  color: #00c0aa;
}

  width: 100%;

  height: 32px;
}

  width: auto;
  margin-top: 15px;
}

  float: right;
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 13px;
  margin-top: 25px;
}

  color: #00c0aa;
}

  height: 75px;
  width: 75px;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 4px;
  right: 4px;
  display: none;
}

  cursor: pointer;
}

  cursor: pointer;
}

}

.widget-area .cta-box {
  margin: 0 0 2em;
}

  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  color: #6d6b82;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

.widget-area .cta-box h3 {
  margin-top: 0;
}

.widget-area .cta-header-quote {
  color: #582c83;
  font-size: 1.125em;
  display: none;
}

.widget-area .cta-header-quote h1 {
  margin-top: -0.15em;
  line-height: 1.1em;
  font-size: 2em;
}

  background-color: #582c83;
  color: #ffffff;
  padding: 1.875em 1.5625em;
}

  font-size: 1.375em;
  margin-top: 0;
  color: #fff;
}

  color: #fff;
  font-weight: normal;
}

  color: #fff;
}

  padding: 1em 1.5625em;

  background-size: contain;
}

  margin-bottom: 0;
  display: inline-block;
  width: 97%;
}

  margin: 0 auto;
}

}

}

  padding: 0 !important;
  margin-top: 0 !important;

  display: none;
}

  font-size: 1.5em;
}

  vertical-align: middle;

  margin-right: 0.75em;
  color: #ffffff;
}

  vertical-align: middle;
}

.sidebar-cta {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto 13.165%;
  float: left;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-width: 0 1px 1px 1px;
  border-color: #dfdfdf;
  border-style: solid;
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 3px 4px #dfdfdf;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 3px 4px #dfdfdf;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 4px #dfdfdf;
}

.sidebar-cta p {
  margin: 0;
  color: #414141;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 0 12px 25px 24px;
}

.sidebar-cta p a {
  color: #657da7;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar-cta p.notbold {
  font-weight: normal;
}

.sidebar-cta a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}

.sidebar-cta img {
  display: block;
  margin: 20px auto 18px;
}

.sidebar-cta h3 {
  margin: 0;
  color: #ffffff;
  font-size: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 16px 18px 16px;
  background-color: #ef8200;
}

.sidebar-cta input[type=text] {
  width: 65%;
  height: 26px;
  margin-left: 24px;
}

.sidebar-cta .submit-btn {
  vertical-align: bottom;
}

/* new patient corner callout styles */
.sidebar-cta h4 {
  color: #657da7;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding-left: 24px;
}

.sidebar-cta .cta-link {
  color: #0D4779;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar-cta .cta-link:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.sidebar-cta .story-callout {
  width: 50%;
  padding: 0 10px 0 25px;
}

.home .sidebar-cta .story-callout {
  width: 58%;
  padding-top: 60px;
}

.sidebar-cta .story-img {
  margin: 0 0 20px 0;
  padding: 0;
  display: inline;
}

  float: right;
  margin: 20px 0 0 20px;
  width: 100%;
}

  padding: 1em 1.5em;
}

  font-size: 2.5vw;
}

  width: 80%;
}

  font-size: 2vw;
}

    margin: 0 0 2em;

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
## Provider Search
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Infinite scroll
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* Globally hidden elements when Infinite Scroll is supported and in use. */
.infinite-scroll .posts-navigation,
.infinite-scroll.neverending .site-footer {
  /* Theme Footer (when set to scrolling) */
  display: none;
}

/* When Infinite Scroll has reached its end we need to re-display elements that were hidden (via .neverending) before. */
.infinity-end.neverending .site-footer {
  display: block;
}

/*--------------------------------------------------------------
# Media
--------------------------------------------------------------*/
.page-content .wp-smiley,
.entry-content .wp-smiley,
.comment-content .wp-smiley {
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-top: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

/* Make sure embeds and iframes fit their containers. */
embed,
iframe,
object {
  max-width: 100%;
}

--------------------------------------------------------------*/

  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  max-width: 100%;
}

  display: block;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

  margin: 0.8075em 0;
}

.wp-caption-text {
  text-align: center;
}

  opacity: 0.6;
  transition: 2s;
}

  height: 35.715vw;
  background-image: none;
  background-size: cover;
  /*display: none;*/
}

  float: left;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 5%;
  text-align: center;
}

  }

  }

    display: none;
  }

    background-image: url(images/hero-boxer.png);
  }

    width: 50%;
    height: 50%;
  }

    background-color: transparent;
  }

    display: block;
  }

  .tv-ad-hero .life-changing.lc-mobile {
    display: none;
  }

    font-size: 2.57vw;
  }

    font-size: 1.715vw;
  }

    margin-top: 1vw;
  }

    width: 50%;
    max-width: 825px;
    min-width: 700px;
  }

    float: left;
  }

    padding-left: 240px;
  }

    text-align: left;
  }
}
